name: Meeting the Flashy Ghost
description: This game doesn't really work....The fail dialogue is kinda redundant (and is honestly not very funny, I'm sorry) and whatever would move forward either doesn't work or resets the game entirely. Please put some more work into this project and make sure it works properly. I know you can do better! Keep practicing! I believe in you, this can be very good. If you've got the passion for this, you can put that love in psychical form.
